chat_history.message:
Hello, my iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:

Why didn't my order arrive? I ordered two phones at the same time and this one hasn't arrived yet, and the other is supposed to be on its way.

Thanks,

Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:
I've been told by the shipping agency to start a claim so they can send me another unit right away since it's in a 'lost' state.
Thank you,

Hello,
My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:
The package never arrived
Thanks,

Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has an issue:
The order is lost. I demand another one as soon as possible. I've been waiting for my phone for over a week and they told me at the UPS office where it arrived that the order can't be found. I demand a new one as soon as possible, I'm quite unhappy since it was supposed to take 2 days and in the end it's going to take more than 2 weeks.

Thank you,

Hello!
 
The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,

Leandra.
Back Market.

Dear Backcare,

We have informed our logistics partner regarding the issue and will update you promptly.

Regards,
JH

Hello! 

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours or this order will be refunded

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,

Leandra.
Back Market Team.

Dear Backcare,

Please assist the customer to provide a handwritten CND. The current CND is invalid as it is not handwritten. 

Thank you.

Regards,
SY

Hello! 

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours or this order will be refunded

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,

Leandra.
Back Market.

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for submitting the relevant documents, I will check back with our logistics partner regarding the claim. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you for your understanding and patience.

Regards,
CH
